lenders.name: charleene
lenders.loan_because: i believe this is a very helpful and effective way to help those who are in need that have the drive and motivation to reach their goals in life.  it's very personal to be able to see photos and read about the different types of businesses and family lives others have in different parts of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: i am a salesperson working for a hotel getting people to come to our hotel and fill our meeting space and guest rooms by selling them on all of the benefits of staying at our hotel versus another hotel

lenders.occupational_info: I enjoy hiking, running, being in the forest near the ocean, being in the desert and the mountains, swimming, motorcycles & archery.

lenders.name: Mimi

lenders.name: Louisa

lenders.occupational_info: Law student

lenders.name: Fred
lenders.loan_because: It's a great investment opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: Doing what I can to make the world a little better.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: The small amounts that I can afford when teamed up with others, equal opportunities for hard working people to prosper.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that manages data from clinical drug trials. Many of these drug trials are for cancer treatments. I write software to help collect and report on this data.

lenders.name: Sheil
lenders.loan_because: I can.  Plain and simple.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I've been blessed to be born in a country of abundance and believe I have an obligation to share that blessing as best I can.

lenders.name: Jeremy
lenders.loan_because: Folks need help all over the world
lenders.occupational_info: Test coatings in lab

lenders.name: KATHRYN
lenders.loan_because: The money that I'm giving is empowering people who have goals.

lenders.name: Maggie
lenders.loan_because: I have everything that I could ever need, and I want to give to people who don't.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to high school. I guess that's work...

lenders.name: St. Mark
lenders.loan_because: We want help people to work for positive change in areas of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of members of St Mark's Episcopal Church in St. Louis Missouri who want to learn more about the Millenium Development Goals.

lenders.name: Ihsan
lenders.loan_because: I have one Internet Cafe and I want aprove my Net Cafe there fore I need money for my career if you help me in this case I never forget your kindness.
lenders.occupational_info: I want make my Net Cafe one of the most famous in the world. And this is my wish in my live that is all.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: management

lenders.name: Jantarp
lenders.loan_because: We have been blessed by God, so we want to bless others in need.  We believe in paying it forward.  It's not what you've got, but what you give that's important.
lenders.occupational_info: Provide reasonably priced rental properties to both help our tenants and provide for the future needs of our family

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: I visited Bolivia last year and the Bolivian people deserve economic opportunities which KIVA can provide

lenders.name: Anup
lenders.loan_because: i think its time we started giving back to society..after taking so much from it without any social conscience
lenders.occupational_info: selling technology solutions for financial institutions

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: This is such a great , personal, way to help others around the world.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: It's AWESOME!  It's like donating, but you get your money back!

lenders.name: Erica
lenders.occupational_info: I go to the Australian National University and study zoology. Mostly I'm interested in herpetology (reptiles and amphibians) and entomology (insects). I also work part time at the Australian Phenomics Facility cleaning cages and observing genetically modified mice.

lenders.name: E.F.
lenders.whereabouts: Republic for California, within the U.S.A., Inc., mainland Amerikan Empire
lenders.loan_because:
I wish the money was being lent at 0% interest to the people as I am lending it.

If all money were lent at 0% by all parties involved, then a true revolution would be realized and world-wide poverty would come to an end within this generation.

Removing the interest payment is removing the payment of tribute to the owners of the money monopoly that keeps the economic slavery in place.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach what money is.  To learn more visit SmartPeopleSmartMoney.com.

lenders.name: Risto
lenders.loan_because: If I help a few others, and each of them will later help a few others, and ... That's how it goes, I hope.
lenders.occupational_info: Automation engineering lecturer

lenders.name: Trish
lenders.loan_because: Although we're just middle-class pensioners by US standards, we're wealthy beyond belief to much of the rest of the world. Education is the key.  I particularly like to loan to women who want to improve their children's lives through education.

lenders.name: Karen, Dundee, Scotland
lenders.loan_because: This is a picture of me and my son; I became a single parent when he was 8 months old, and appreciate what it means to accept help and to  be given chances.
lenders.occupational_info: A challenge every day!

lenders.name: Fred  W.
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I want to help end poverty in the world

lenders.name: Us  :)
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone can achieve something good if given a push in the right direction.

lenders.name: Pam
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate that I have more than I need for a comfortable life. This seems a good way to share that good fortune.

lenders.name: marilou
lenders.loan_because: i loan because i want to have a business to become an operator of public utility vehicle.in our placed
lenders.occupational_info: it is a manufacturing  company

lenders.name: Brian Donnelly
lenders.loan_because: Didn't have much growing up but never went to bed hungry .... very very grateful and He said ..." Care for my sheep " ... so I do what I can ...

lenders.name: Joel
lenders.loan_because:
Others have helped me in the past, and I have the means to help others in turn.

Servi en Chile por dos anos como misionero para la Iglesia de Jesucristo de los Santos de los Ultimos Dias.  Desde entonces he continuado trabajando con gente en necesidad, o por medio de la iglesia, o por medio de la red y sitios como kiva.  Espero que puedo ayudar a otros como otros me han ayudado en el pasado.
lenders.occupational_info:
I'm a soldier in the US Army, a bishop in my church, and an author.  I also do real estate investing.

Soy soldado en el ejercito de los EEUU.  Soy autor (aun que todavia no se he publicado).

lenders.name: Subhasish
lenders.loan_because: I belong to a middle class family. My father took some personal loans for urgent purposes in our family. I am still a student. i can't see my parents get abased by the bank representativs everyday. I want to do a small business to help them to a some extent.

lenders.name: Andriana
lenders.loan_because: It's a great program!!
lenders.occupational_info: I help undocumented immigrants who are trauma survivors get papers and start a new life here in New York

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: To make a positive difference by helping those who are in need.
lenders.occupational_info: Doing good things for others.

lenders.name: Anita
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Jerry
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving back and helping others who are attempting to help themselves.  It is my way of following the example of Jesus Christ and honoring my West Indian heritage of helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with seniors in an attempt to help them maximize their finances and improve their lives by utilizing the equity in their homes and converting that equity into cash that can be used in multiple ways to improve the quality of their lives as they enter their sunset years.

lenders.name: Camilo & Catherine
lenders.loan_because: We want to share our blessings with others.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: How else can I embrace someone so far away?  KIVA is a wonderful opportunity to show love.
lenders.occupational_info: When someone is injured or seriously ill, I am part of a team to help them back to health.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: I have travelled to developing countries several times, and seen how hard it is to improve your life when you start with nothing. I think Kiva is a fantastic way to make a tangible difference in someone's life, that will benefit them, and possibly further generations.
lenders.occupational_info: I am training to be a Speech and Language Therapist. I will be helping people to speak, from older people who've had strokes, and can't remember their words, to children as young as 3 months who are having problems with their developing language

lenders.name: Tristan
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity.

lenders.name: Dave & Elise
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people that want to both earn a decent living at home, and improve their family and community conditions.

lenders.name: Jas_Chinita
lenders.loan_because:
Given the right opportunity one can  rise above the issues that suround them. 

No one chose who, where, when and how we came into this world,  but we can make a difference to help those in need, and those in need can make a difference when given the materials and making the right choices. 

We can all make a difference, and make the right choices. 

This is just the beginning.  

I am also a contributor to Ryan's Well Foundation www.ryanswell.org. & 
Children's International.

lenders.name: ENRICO
lenders.loan_because: I love Africa, I love the idea of microcredit, and I really hope this lend can help

lenders.name: lisby and kara
lenders.loan_because: we've been helped in hard times and now we want to help. That 1 John thing... :)

lenders.name: Team Illumina
lenders.loan_because: We're sharing a performance bonus given at the end of big project.

lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves the opportunity to grow their assets, invest in their future and raise the quality of their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: The program I coordinate invests money in neighborhoods and brings people together to work on creating a common vision and developing improvement projects for their own neighborhood.

lenders.name: Alan
lenders.loan_because: I can, and I should.
lenders.occupational_info: A fixer

lenders.loan_because: I believe in people, and people need to be given chances.  I want to share some of the "chances" I have had...
lenders.occupational_info: I provide professional development to educators, primarily K-12 around technology integration and project based learning.

lenders.name: Madison and Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: I want to help give people the opportunity to make their lives better.

lenders.name: Casey
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is a wonderful way for us to s-t-r-e-t-c-h our limited funds for donations to those less fortunate than us. What better way to help those who are helping themselves!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired software engineer. My wife is an artist, architect, and instructor. We have two wonderful sons, ages 17 and 9.  We will soon re-locate to Costa Rica where we will build eco-friendly housing and start a small bio-diesel generation plant.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Cameron

lenders.occupational_info: We have so much, so share some.

lenders.loan_because: I was profoundly moved by what these people are doing for their families and communities and i want them to be able to continue.

lenders.name: Patrick & Jenna

lenders.occupational_info: I'm a manager in a hotel.  Jenna works as senior research manager.

lenders.name: www.TechTough.com
lenders.occupation: We custom design BLACK COBRA Panasonic Toughbooks
lenders.loan_because:
I am fortunate to be an entrepreneur in a wealthy modern country which has given me many advantages that other people do not have.

I think we get a deeper meaning in life when we help those less fortunate than us "the secret to living is giving". 

It is only fair that we give back to either our local or global community in some way.
lenders.occupational_info:
We sell the TOUGHEST laptops on Planet Earth !

If you need a laptop for outdoor use, in your car, on a boat or in any harsh environments there is no better choice then a rugged Black Cobra Panasonic Toughbook CF-19 and CF-30

These are used by police, military, etc... because they are on average 10x more reliable then standard consumer laptops and are super Tough. Search for TOUGHBOOK on youtube and see for yourself.

lenders.name: Legere Family
lenders.loan_because: I saw a show on tv and decided even though I'm one person making ends meet, there are other people that who need help too. What better way to make the world a better place than right here starting with one person. I'm glad that I can help someone take needed steps to make their life better and to provide for not only their families but their community. Great idea!!

lenders.name: michael
lenders.loan_because: I ve gone through some tough times after a recent separation and have recieved lots of help.
lenders.occupational_info: I maintain golf courses and football pitches

lenders.name: gsik
lenders.loan_because: I like to enable people and help them achieve their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: Entrepreneur with a passion for filmmaking and photography.

lenders.name: Marco Chan
lenders.loan_because: tous les gestes comptent!
lenders.occupational_info: On cherche tous sans cesse...mais chacun a un but différent.

lenders.loan_because: i would like to setup education center
lenders.occupational_info: i am going to teach computer education for the people who are financially poor

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: I hope that a small contribution from me will have a positive impact to someone elses life.

lenders.name: Denice
lenders.loan_because: It's important to give what we can and reach out to other people. Together we can make a difference.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I feel happy

lenders.name: Gustaaf Vocking
lenders.loan_because: loaning is more than just giving.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people realize what their true dreams are and then help them truly realize the dreams through training/coaching/consulting.

lenders.loan_because: I can. We all should.

lenders.loan_because: i want to help women be successful in business.  I appreciate women who have the initiative and strength to own and run a business on their own.
lenders.occupational_info: as a coach i help people become more confident so they can reach their dreams.  I also teach others how to do this.

lenders.name: Massimo
lenders.loan_because: if there's only a man dreaming, that remains just a dream. If there are many, then a new reality will come to life.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of circumventing the government in order to facilitate international development.

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: I've been blessed and need to share it.

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: I have traveled the world and want to give back in ways I couldn't while I was there. And it is so much more effective than giving handouts on the street. "Teach a man to fish...", and "Trade, not Aid"!
lenders.occupational_info: Helping develop difficult to access oil reserves in Canada's North to feed the world's appetite for energy.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy it.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: I want people to be able to have the resources to realize their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach Physics to high school students (16-18 years old) in the United States.  Also, I buy houses, fix them, and rent them to people.

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because: We're all in this together.

lenders.name: Katherine
lenders.loan_because: I've travelled all around the world and seeing those people who have so little yet  work so hard inspires me. These are people who are trying to better their circumstances through hard work and they should have the right to help without simplifying it as being charity.

lenders.name: Erika
lenders.loan_because: I believe we all should get chances to succeed in our dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: HP

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Katelyn
lenders.loan_because: my Uncle Ed generously gave me a Kiva gift certificate!
lenders.occupational_info: A day filled with arts & crafts, outdoor play, singing, dancing and story time.

lenders.name: Jodi Selander
lenders.loan_because: I want to support women around the world who are working to provide for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a natural birth and women's advocate. I want to empower women to make positive choices about their health and wellness.

lenders.name: El Camino
lenders.loan_because: the world is getting bigger and bigger, and yet smaller and smaller.  For people in developing countries who are just as entrepeneurial and just as savvy, but may not have access to the same resources to really get their business going, loaning gives them enough to change their own lives, the lives of their families, and hopefully, the lives of their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with young people who want to give a year of their lives to work at non-profits directly serving the poor.

lenders.name: Ami
lenders.loan_because: I love these children and I want them and others to reach their maximum potential.

lenders.name: Neil & Cindy
lenders.loan_because: Helping people help themselves is an expression of our Christian beliefs.
lenders.occupational_info:
CPA-a financial advisor to business and individuals.

Social Worker- one who works for equality, justice and human dignity for all humankind.

lenders.name: Gabriele
lenders.loan_because: This is a moment in my life, where I would like to do something for someone else that I've never done before
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an international firm that provide a wide offer of lubricating handling tools.

lenders.name: Katrina & Pascal
lenders.loan_because: I believe a little can make a lot of difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Katrina is in the family business of Real Estate and Pascal is a freelance Illustrator, Animator and Art Director.

lenders.name: Britt
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people do work they love.
lenders.occupational_info: I’m a blogger, podcaster, and blog coach for artists, writers, entrepreneurs and do-gooders. I’m also a big vision consultant who loves to help people find and express their calling.

lenders.name: Brett
lenders.loan_because: I love the world.

lenders.name: Allyson & Ed
lenders.loan_because: We think banks contribute to the vast economic discrepancies in our world. We love to travel and are happy to have this opportunity to connect to people across the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach writing at two local universities in San Francisco, and my husband is a photographer.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.occupational_info: Video Gaming

lenders.name: MASSIMILIANO
lenders.loan_because: I CAN

lenders.name: Rebekah
lenders.loan_because: My husband and I were both missionaries in Brazil before we got married, and we knew so many wonderful people there who worked so hard but due to a lack of resources were unable to get ahead. I loan because I am so grateful for their friendships and for the blessings I have in my own life.

lenders.name: Jeffrey
lenders.loan_because: if by making loans that are to me relatively small, I can nonetheless make a positive difference in the lives of others, I'm delighted to do so.

lenders.name: NW Girls
lenders.loan_because: Our dad is teaching us the importance of giving to those in need. We look at this opportunity as a "hand up, not a hand out". It makes us feel good that we are helping those in need around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: We are just kids growing up in the beautiful State of Washington in the Pacific Northwest of the United States.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: it's one of the best causes to invest money into!

lenders.name: Anish Shah
lenders.loan_because: We can make this world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an owner of a website that connects  people seeking legal representation with lawyers in their area.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Building relationships and community online using social media.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: It just makes sense to help others whenever possible.  I have been helped by others and  it's nice to pass it on.
lenders.occupational_info: My work includes interior painting, house-sitting, pet-sitting, and house cleaning services.

lenders.name: Aline
lenders.loan_because: I want to.

lenders.name: Kyle
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Hillary and George
lenders.loan_because: We want to take seriously the call of Jesus to provide for those who are widowed and/or in need. His love for them becomes our love for them, and we hope that, through these gifts, they would experience His love.

lenders.name: Sharron
lenders.loan_because: I watched a program on PBS about KIVA very late one night. I am very bouyed  by the concept of being able to give a tangible message of  support to someone with a vision.  The message is: I have heard you and  I believe in you.
lenders.occupational_info: I work toward improvement in the lives of children and families in the Province where I live.

lenders.name: Meghan
lenders.loan_because: Last year I was the treaurer for a school club.  We found we had some money left over at the end of the year and decided to put it towards a charitable cause.  Kiva is a way to make that money reach more people.
lenders.occupational_info: I make art for video games.

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those who are working hard to make a better life for themselves and their family.

lenders.name: Emilio Karam L.
lenders.loan_because:
I like to give back and help other people who need it the most. 

Sometimes just a bit of help makes a HUGE difference on someone's life... I like to be part of that and hopefully make someone's life a a better one, and making the world a better place for all of us.

I know sounds corny, but I do believe it.
lenders.occupational_info:
I love my life. 
 
I've been entrepreneurial of my life. I've had some downfalls and some very important successes, but nothing compared to what I'm currently doing, and the fun I'm having.

And I get to work where I want, with the people I want, when I want, and also helping a lot of people to do the same.

I believe success should be built upon the success of others and reaching out to helping those who need it.

I'm also a huge fan of personal development. In fact, I'm an NLP Advanced Master Practitionar and Trainer... now it's just for fun, and lots of it!

In 2009, I am launching several business adventures, with the goal of breaking the $1'000,000 mark in online sales.

DOING more, BEING more, making more MONEY, having more FUN, and GIVING BACK more !

lenders.name: Howard
lenders.loan_because: Because I ought to. Because I can. Because it makes me feel better.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a storyteller (although it's become a little complex lately).

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: This is a perfect way to get money to those who need it. If everyone in the world could support themselves the world would be a much better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I find stories in numbers and data and try to make sense of it all. I love what I do but it is a bit of conversation stopper :-)

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: I have visited people in need and have realized that everyone can use a helping hand every once and a while.
lenders.occupational_info: I am attending a university so that I can learn how to build structures once I graduate.

lenders.name: John T
lenders.loan_because: it works
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a nurse in a hospital

lenders.name: Hathai
lenders.loan_because: All my life I've been blessed with the best of everything...and all of my life I have said that _someday_ I would give back something.  Well, someday should be today.  Even if it isn't much, it's a start.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist my client companies in understanding and following the environmental laws of the United States and California.

lenders.name: Tracy ann
lenders.loan_because: I owe it to my kids to make the world as good a place as I can make it.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the federal government, helping to fund projects on public lands in Alaska.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I have traveled and lived all over the world and saw how important small entrepreneurs are to the local economy and how difficult it can be to get a loan to start or expand a bussiness.  I admire their spirit and want to help them achieve their dreams.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I believe in people doing the right thing and achieving their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell advertising to small businesses.

lenders.name: Aaron
lenders.loan_because: I can and I have a responsibility to.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm in high school. I split my time doing school work and thinking about helping the world (such as through Kiva).

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: Microloans rule.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in charge of a news website in Seattle

lenders.name: gregory
lenders.loan_because: I like those , who are welling to work hard achiving a dream - should have a chance to make it so.
lenders.occupational_info: I pan for precisions metals in rivers, embankments and in the ground.

lenders.name: I CAN SAVE THE WORLD
lenders.loan_because: I can save the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Complicated, challenging, humbling, joyful, universal, global.

lenders.name: lutalo bbosa
lenders.loan_because: I want to help the poorer than me just as I also want assistance to flourish further
lenders.occupational_info: Hard working artist and designer always exploring new fields

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.  I hope to be a small part of making a positive difference in someone else's life.

lenders.name: Joselito
lenders.loan_because: I want to venture into a direct selling business which I have been involved before. Unfortunately, I have no available money to operate it.
lenders.occupational_info: Its good. But here in our country we have to seek other alternative job to keep-up with our daily needs

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy travelling, and want to make sure some of my money benefits sustainable projects, run by indiviuals, in the coutires I visit

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: It feels like the best way to help people to succeed - they have the skills, we can help with the money
lenders.occupational_info: Trying to get development organisations and businesses to work together more

lenders.name: Penny
lenders.loan_because: I've lived in Nigeria and Burkina Faso and met wonderful people there.  Jesus said, "Give and it will be given to you."  I have found this to be true, but I don't give to receive back. I give for the joy of seeing another person blessed.
lenders.occupational_info: My mother is paralyzed and unable to walk.  I take care of her and my father who are both over 70 years old.  To earn a little extra money I substitute teach.  When a teacher is unable to teach, I take her place in the classroom temporarily.

lenders.name: Floris
lenders.loan_because: I live
lenders.occupational_info: IT

lenders.name: Erwin
lenders.loan_because: I like to see new entrepreneurs can have a start.
lenders.occupational_info: Follow your dreams

lenders.name: Adrien
lenders.loan_because: I want to share the blessings God has given to me.
lenders.occupational_info: Business consultant:  helping others learn how to be more efficient.

lenders.name: Ruthann
lenders.loan_because: This is one way to redistribute the wealth of our world and allow those in poverty to have dignity as they work toward a better economic life for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a Cardiac Cath Lab in a hospital but my real work is organizing mission teams to Louisiana  to work with the rebuilding of the Gulf Coast after Katrina's wrath.

lenders.name: Bambi
lenders.loan_because: If I give a person a fish she has a meal; if I give a person the ability to fish she has a future.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I am able to and I can't think of a better way to help!  I get such a kick out of seeing people succeed with a little hand up.  As long as I am able, I will continue to loan.
lenders.occupational_info: I am semi-retired.

lenders.name: Lars
lenders.loan_because: I get a kick out of helping people to help themselves.

lenders.name: SAS
lenders.loan_because: It is something that brings us together as a workgroup to help others enjoy their careers like we do.
lenders.occupational_info: SAS is a group that helps our clients hire and promote great people into their organizations.

lenders.name: Erika, Paige, and Jack
lenders.loan_because: I love helping people in any way I can.
lenders.occupational_info: In my spare time I volunteer for the local vegetarian group, and also started a small photography company that raises funds for animal shelters.

lenders.name: S. KIMOUR
lenders.loan_because: je veux renforcer mes activités et améliorer le bien être social dans les milieux ruraux  de Kinshasa par  l'utilisation d'électricité solaires (alimenter une petite radio à 2 piles et alumer une lampe, ... ) je suis dans le besoin de $ 1.500,00 usd. Ainsi vulgariser la cuisine solaire afin de lutter contre le déboissement dans nos mileux et sauver l'environnement (notre forêt en RDCongo).  Ce crédit servira de fonds de commerce pour la vente des produits solaires (panneaux solaires , cuiseurs solaires etc... C'est grâce au revenu tiré de cette activité que je peux subvenir aux besoins de ma famille . je dispose une grande expérience dans ce domaine et je peux mener a bien mon activité  Thank you a lot. I am Frenchman , sorry .
lenders.occupational_info: Je suis un technicien électronicien je travaille avec des amis pour aider la population rurale  à utilise l'électricité solaire à moins cher ,

lenders.name: Gwendolyn
lenders.loan_because: I am a small business owner and know how much a little help from friends and strangers can make a huge difference in a life and a business.
lenders.occupational_info: I make stained glass windows, lamps and artwork.  I work with clients to design individual pieces for their homes.

lenders.name: pixeleo
lenders.loan_because: i wanted to create a b2b website portal in which i believe i could earn more and help the community in return.

lenders.name: Tara and Seth
lenders.loan_because: We care about the global community.
lenders.occupational_info: Seth works at a local independent bookstore and Tara is a substitute teacher.

lenders.name: Marianne
lenders.loan_because: It is such a fun and easy way to make a little difference.

lenders.name: Dina
lenders.loan_because: God has truly blessed me.  I love the way small businesses are the backbone of a community.  These are the companies that reach out to the small causes and family issues that some big companies might miss because no attention is drawn to it.  It is helping your neigbor, and I love it:)

lenders.name: chantal
lenders.loan_because: i am human

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because:
Some would say...Why? 
I say...Why Not?
lenders.occupational_info: I prepare tax returns, business records, and financial statements for my clients. They use the  Information to manage their business.  I also consult with them when they have questions. The overall objective is to help them manage their business efficiently and profitably.

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: It's a simply easy way to help change someone's life. It's a good feeling knowing a small amount of money can have the power to change somone's life.

lenders.name: eriq
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I make things happen.

lenders.name: June
lenders.loan_because: Many people have helped me and this is my chance to help others.

lenders.name: Trinity
lenders.loan_because: My mother has been so excited about her experience with Kiva, that she gave me a gift certificate to get me started. We love talking about the businesses people have, where they live, and their plans for growth. We cheer when people meet their goals.

lenders.name: abiodun
lenders.loan_because: I need money to start small scale business
lenders.occupational_info: smallscale business

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help hard working people be successful entrepreneurs.  Everyone deserves a chance to live a better life by bettering themselves.

lenders.name: jmvk
lenders.loan_because: I can and therefore I should.

lenders.name: Anne Marie
lenders.loan_because: my loan will enable other women to help themselves. I am a business woman and this is a wonderful way to help other women.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as an Accountant helping companies manage their money. Most of my day is spent in an office building working on the computer.

lenders.name: Curtis
lenders.loan_because: I can make a difference.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I love the entreprenurial spirit and enjoy helping people attain their goals.

lenders.name: Michele
lenders.loan_because: I want to share money that I believe can do worlds of good for others in need and also because I believe in being a smart investor of the future
lenders.occupational_info: Well, I'm a hard working  christian african american woman. The mother of two children and two grandchildren. I want to share myself financially and spiritually to others around the world who are in need as a part of my life fullfillment. I love being an active part of my community as well as in my church community.  I live by the bible in hopes that all who believes in GOD can do great.  "I want to help , so I'm here"

lenders.name: Wendy & Bethany
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping people reach their goals!

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because:
I was inspired by 2006 Nobel Peace Prize winner Muhammad Yunus of Bangladesh and the Grameen Bank.

"To leave the world a bit better, whether by a healthy child, a garden patch or a redeemed social condition; to know even one life has breathed easier because you have lived. This is to have succeeded." - Ralph Waldo Emerson

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves the opportunity to make a better life for their family and themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a business school student.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.occupational_info: I help people make their written work easy to read and understand.

lenders.name: Afzal Hossain
lenders.loan_because: they can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Just do it!

lenders.name: Buchanan Family
lenders.occupation: Emerging Markets Trader; Real Estate Sales
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is a great opportunity to help enable people who are working hard to help themselves succeed and help lift them and their families out of poverty.  We want to help enable growing and eventually self-sustaining businesses.  There are many great ideas that not only help the borrowers but their communities as well.

lenders.name: Sean
lenders.loan_because: It instills the entrepreneur spirit.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a group of people that develop computer software that provides a service to the legal industry.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: People should be able to pursue their dreams through self-employment.
lenders.occupational_info: I help inspire people to lead lives that help others.

lenders.name: Bill DAlessandro
lenders.loan_because: It's a cool way to help people get on their feet. Plus it encourages entrepreneurship.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on technology projects that help make the internet backbone function.

lenders.name: Jamie
lenders.loan_because: I'm an entrepreneur myself, and while I have lots of options available to me - not everyone does. My vision is to make money as an entrepreneur to help my family, but always to take a percentage of what we make and use it to fund entrepreneurs around the world, so they can make a difference in their lives and of the people around them. Magnify and expand, and create the maximum benefit for the most people!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a partner in a Canadian designer jewellery company that provides an amazing opportunity for people all around the world to work with our designer lines Feri and Feri Mosh online and make their dreams come true as an entrepreneur. I also run a real estate investment company that buys houses and rents them to good people, and I work with computers for a company that helps businesses get back taxes from the government!

lenders.name: Francis Reyes
lenders.loan_because: I think it's important to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a  college student.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: I know from personal experience how hard it can be to start a business. So it is now my responsibility to use what I have been given to help others.
lenders.occupational_info:
After a 14 years' experience working for companies and organization with high-level strategic goals and brand positioning I now run the User Research and Strategy department of Axance, a French company specialized in user studies.


As a senior consultant, I also work with companies to fully comprehend end-users needs and abilities, and to create a global experience that enhances the services and products they provide.

In addition to his work, I regularly lecture on Internet strategy, leading master classes on e-commerce and e-communication.

lenders.name: Jeff Benton
lenders.loan_because:
Microlending is not only an opportunity to lend and/or give to individuals in need, it also offers an opportunity to invest in the local economy.  Since small businesses often drive economic growth, these investments in the local economy have the potential to benefit an even wider group of people living in poverty.

"He who is kind to the poor lends to the Lord, and he will reward him for what he has done."  Proverbs 19:17.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently working as a night watchman (security guard).

lenders.name: Robert and Racquel
lenders.loan_because: We have a strong belief in helping others to help themselves.

lenders.loan_because: I WANT TO IMPORT SOME PRODUCTS.IAM ALSO DOING A SMALL BUSNIES BUT NOW I WANT TO DEVOLP MY BUSNIES .
lenders.occupational_info: I WANT A PARTNER WHO INVEST IN MY BUSNIES I WILL GIVE HIME A BETTER PROFIT ON MONTHLY BAS.

lenders.name: Jermaine
lenders.loan_because: I feel like I'm making a difference without having the multimillionaire budgets and big staff. I'm glad that my $50 and $25 can go that far.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a retail manager (assistant). Not the best job in the world, but it pays the bills. Basically, I manage to get food into people's hands and keep the operation going. My real passion is finance...obviously! lol

lenders.name: Grandchild Bella
lenders.loan_because: paying back karma
lenders.occupational_info: Design medical imaging equipment  CT, MRI, Xray

lenders.name: Eugene
lenders.loan_because: When you help someone else it opens the door for you to be helped as well (Psalms 41:1-3, Acts 9:36, Proverbs 19:17, 22:9).  We all need help some of the time.  I hope to someday have a prosperous business of my own.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computer installations, configurations, troubleshooting related issues, software upgrades, and some basic lan administration.

lenders.name: Francis Parker
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we can. Through the process of raising money and lending money, our teachers hope we realize the enormous benefits of giving and of empowering others. We are 9 and 10 years old, but we have the ability to pull together and help people in other parts of the world in a meaningful way.
lenders.occupational_info: We are students at an independent school in the United States. We are learning through our work at school what it takes to start a small business. It is hard work! In January we create small businesses at school. Hopefully, our businesses are profitable. If they are, the money we raise through these efforts will be used to lend to real-world entrepreneurs through Kiva.

lenders.name: SARPONG
lenders.loan_because: I want to expand the business.To buy more eggs and sell.
lenders.occupational_info: A small business, which needs improvement.

Change the world, just a little: "yes we can!"

Integrate some tricky methodologies within big companies.

CAD/ computation integration (CATIA V5)

lenders.loan_because: I know how it feels to be unfortunate. Because of somebody's generosity, i am able to give.

lenders.name: Tracey
lenders.loan_because: borders and boundaries should not continue the cycle of poverty experienced by so many of the world's population.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher and counsellor of high school students but my real passion comes from exposing students to global issues, political discussions and debates, particularly in the area of social change and global activism.

lenders.name: Brandon
lenders.loan_because: The people I lend my money to are honest, earnest working individuals that need a small boost that will, in turn, reap large benefits.
lenders.occupational_info: Filling my brain with all sort of knowledge and wisdom...something of that nature.

lenders.name: Yadong
lenders.loan_because:
I have being given a lot of opportunities in my life to improve myself. I want that someone else has an opportunity as well. I like the idea of helping people to become independent. 

I want to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info:
Born in China and have 19 years education before coming to the States. Got my PhD in Digital Signal Processing from University of Rhode Island.Now live in the heart of Silicon Valley as a normal hard-working IT engineer with some big dreams. Active reader, like sharing the books with friends. One of my favorites books is: Bank for the poor.

My main life-going Interests: "learn new things."

lenders.name: MAURO
lenders.loan_because: penso sia un buon modo di aiutare la gente che ha bisogno

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.loan_because: everyone should ...

lenders.name: Judith
lenders.loan_because: It is a very real and direct thing to do and hopefully contributes to a better life for the people who receive the Kiva loans.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a highschool teacher of Classical Studies, i.e. Latin and (ancient) Greek and Classical History

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: Finally I feel I can really make a difference aiding people directly in the developping world.

lenders.name: jonathan
lenders.loan_because: i feel as though i have opportunties that everybody in the world should be able to access.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: Microfinancing is one of the greatest ideas of the past 50 years.  It provides real money to real entrepreneurs.

lenders.name: Neil & Vanessa
lenders.loan_because: We've been lucky
lenders.occupational_info: We work as walking and cycling guides in Spain & France

lenders.name: Brandon
lenders.occupational_info: Volunteer management and communications

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: God teaches us to help the poor.

lenders.name: Bruce
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves .
lenders.occupational_info: Business Consulting

lenders.name: Donnie and Ericka
lenders.loan_because: The use of microloans through Kiva helps to undo what the world bank and the IMF destroy. Treat those in poverty as equals who simply lack capital. We have too much of it so give it up. Power to the people. And so begins the change.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell cnady, coffee, pastries and chips in vending machines.

lenders.name: Ian
lenders.loan_because: I have been fortunate, and  enjoy helping people.  I have been helped many times in my own life. Everyone needs a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people to help themselves.  I try to help them make a little sense of their finances and lives along the way! I am a perpetual student with a love of reading, thinking, and all things arts-related.

lenders.name: Kayleen
lenders.loan_because: I want to see entrepreneurs succeed with their businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: PSW means "Personal Support Worker". In Canada, this is what we call a nurse's aide. I work for an agency which sends me to work for many patients, in hospitals, retirement homes, and private homes. I help the elderly, the disabled, the sick, and the dying. I feed them, bathe them, and help them with other tasks to make them feel clean and comfortable.

lenders.name: DIRK & CLO
lenders.loan_because: We can and we care.

lenders.name: Hugo
lenders.loan_because: I am eager to know how this works in order to promote the system across my friends because this is a very positive way to directly support people that needs help.
lenders.occupational_info: no professional work anymore ( before internal sap consultant and project leader ), now doing everything I like
